name: Pogopocalypse
description:
POGOPOCALYPSE

The world is in its final days as a result of nuclear war... and meteor showers... and an alien invasion... and... zombies? You're basically screwed no matter what, so you might as well go out in the coolest way possible: on a pogo stick! Use it to bounce to the highest distance you can.

This game was made for the Notice Me Game Jam.

CONTROLS:

A/D or Left/Right arrow key: Tilt pogo stick

Space bar: Charge-up jump, continue

Shift: Small bounce

WASD/Arrow Keys: Navigate in bubble, enter initials

Escape: Pause Game

R: Quick Restart

CREDITS:

All art, programming, and design was done by me.

Music from playonloop.com.

Sound effects were made using bfxr, FL Studio, Audacity, and also found on Freesound.org.

Fonts from 1001fonts.com.
